 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
March 26, 2007 
 
 
 
Dear Administrative Contact: 
 
I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site at: 
http://www.mortgagehome.biz/adjustableratemortgage that contains a 
trademark violation for Ohio Savings Bank. Ohio Savings Bank is the 
owner of the Ohio Savings Bank and Amtrust trademarks and associated 
domain names.  
 
I have attempted to remove this infraction by delivering two 
notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record, however, the 
domain owner refuses to remove the infraction.  
 
The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer 
confusion by using Ohio Savings Bank's trademarks to divert traffic away

from the corporate website at http://www.ohiosavings.com. This action 
constitutes trademark infringement and unfair competition. I am 
therefore asking for your assistance in having the domain owner remove 
all any and all of the above references from their site. I truly 
appreciate your co-operation in this matter and hope to hear from you at

your earliest convenience. 
 
Sincerely,  
 
Trademark Department 
Ohio Savings Bank/AmTrust Legal Administrator  
 
 
Legal Administrator <administrator-111@legal-notification.com> 
[IFID:98PIP]
